nodes.excerpt: It's often difficult for most people to share their thoughts and over time it builds up in them, to let people have these thoughts free and release their burden we build this app. Here everyone can write freely without being getting judged by others.
nodes.title: Articled - Write where your words matter | Read & write short stories.
nodes.author: Sajal Rai

localize.description: 对于大多数人来说，往往很难分享自己的想法，久而久之就会积压在心里，为了让大家有这些想法自由，释放自己的负担，我们建立了这个应用。在这里，每个人都可以自由写作，而不会被别人评头论足。
localize.tagline: 写在你的文字重要的地方｜阅读和写短篇小说。

localize.description: 對於大多數人來說，往往很難分享自己的想法，久而久之就會積壓在心裏，爲了讓大家有這些想法自由，釋放自己的負擔，我們建立了這個應用。在這裏，每個人都可以自由寫作，而不會被別人評頭論足。
localize.tagline: 寫在你的文字重要的地方｜閱讀和寫短篇小說。

nodes.excerpt: Lack of communication channels on websites results in customer churn, low satisfaction rate and minimal to zero customer success. LiveCaller solves those issues by offering all in one solution, that combines Web Call, Web Chat, Callback, Social Messaging Apps

localize.tagline: 免费网络通话，在线聊天，全频道和共同浏览。

nodes.excerpt: Have you ever wanted to search for a remote job without getting tracked, being forced to sign in, having your resume crawled, or experiencing "location bias"? Ever felt like your job search has been at the expense of your privacy? We have. And we're fixing it.

localize.description: 您同樣的銀行賬戶，但沒有惱人的費用。使用您的現有賬戶享受免手續費的銀行服務，無需轉換銀行或開立新賬戶。豁免透支費、維持費和信用卡逾期費。
localize.tagline: 阻止透支、維護費和信用卡滯納金。

nodes.excerpt: Without Community, There Is No Crypto. LunarCRUSH is a social listening platform for cryptocurrencies and helps investors make better decisions by tracking the community each cryptocurrency is building through beautiful dashboards and real-time data analysis.
nodes.title: LunarCRUSH - Social Listening for Cryptocurrencies
nodes.author: Mahesh Shrestha

localize.description: 没有社区，就没有加密。LunarCRUSH是一个加密货币的社交聆听平台，通过精美的仪表盘和实时数据分析，跟踪每个加密货币正在建立的社区，帮助投资者做出更好的决策。
localize.tagline: 加密货币的社交聆听

localize.description: 沒有社區，就沒有加密。LunarCRUSH是一個加密貨幣的社交聆聽平臺，通過精美的儀表盤和實時數據分析，跟蹤每個加密貨幣正在建立的社區，幫助投資者做出更好的決策。
localize.tagline: 加密貨幣的社交聆聽

nodes.excerpt: With Crove app you can create your repetitive business documents as intelligent templates that use variables and logical conditions.
nodes.title: Crove - Automate your repetitive business documents
nodes.author: Gourav Manchanda

localize.description: 通过Crove应用，您可以将重复性的业务文档创建为使用变量和逻辑条件的智能模板。
localize.tagline: 自动化您的重复性业务文件

localize.description: 通過Crove應用，您可以將重複性的業務文檔創建爲使用變量和邏輯條件的智能模板。
localize.tagline: 自動化您的重複性業務文件

nodes.excerpt: Hyper is an animoji voice chat app for gamers & anime fans. Meet people and voice chat, without the anxiety of revealing your real face. We give you tools to draw, voice chat, and more. The more time you spend, the more coins you earn for new characters.
nodes.title: Hyper Online - Animoji social network for people into games and anime.
nodes.author: Michael Seibel

localize.description: Hyper是一款专为游戏玩家和动漫迷打造的动漫语音聊天应用。与人见面，语音聊天，不用担心露出真面目。我们给你提供绘画、语音聊天等工具。花费的时间越多，赚取的金币越多，可以获得新的角色。
localize.tagline: Animoji社交网络为人们进入游戏和动漫。

localize.description: Hyper是一款專爲遊戲玩家和動漫迷打造的動漫語音聊天應用。與人見面，語音聊天，不用擔心露出真面目。我們給你提供繪畫、語音聊天等工具。花費的時間越多，賺取的金幣越多，可以獲得新的角色。
localize.tagline: Animoji社交網絡爲人們進入遊戲和動漫。
